summary: A wealthy New Yorker wrestles with the decision to leave her cheating husband, as she and her friends discover that women really can have it all.
cast: Meg Ryan|Annette Bening|Eva Mendes|Debra Messing|Jada Pinkett Smith|Bette Midler|Candice Bergen|Carrie Fisher|Cloris Leachman|Debi Mazar|India Ennenga|Jill Flint|Ana Gasteyer|Joanna Gleason|Tilly Scott Pedersen|Lynn Whitfield|Natasha Alam|Emily Seymour|Allison Seymour|Lauren Lefebvre|Lindsay Lefebvre|Isabella Panteledes|Olivia Panteledes|Madaleine Black|Meredith Black|Jana Robbins|Maya Ri Sanchez|Ruby Hondros|NiCole Robinson|Danielle Perry|Lindsay Flathers|Christy Scott Cashman|Celeste Oliva|Denece Ryland|Allyssa Brooke|Jordan Schechter|Marina Re|Stephanie Clayman|Maria Elena Ramirez|Pamela Lambert|Ellen Withrow|Celia Allen|Ellen Becker-Gray|Marie Brandt|Desiree April Connolly|Rose Davidson|Shelly Finnegan|Chaseedaw Giles|Jennifer Gjulameti|Una Green|Barbara Guertin|Kimmie Johnson|Lynn L'Heureux|Dawn Newman|Roxanne Nichols|Nefertara Ozella|Luz Alexandra Ramos|Alicia Seymour|Vyvian B. title: The Women
